mapper.select: select p.pro_image, p.pro_name, p.pro_price, p.pro_discount, c.mypro_cnt from cart c join product p on c.pro_code = p.pro_code where c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update cart set mypro_cnt = '' where user_id = '' and pro_code = ''
mapper.delete: delete cart where user_id = '' and pro_code = ''
